resources.string: Remind me every day at this time

Normal blood pressure: systolic pressure (top number) below 120 and diastolic pressure (bottom number) below 80.
 Prehypertension: systolic 120-139 or diastolic 80-89
 Stage I hypertension: systolic 140-159 or diastolic 90-99
 Stage II hypertension: systolic 160 or higher or diastolic 100 or higher.
